title: Engineering Equity in Power: The Regional Impact of Dr. Alina Mercer

figures.title: Income gains after grid electrification (Bangladesh)
figures.caption: Reported income gains range from 9% to 30% following grid electrification in a rural Bangladesh household survey.
figures.sourceTitle: Welfare Impacts of Rural Electrification: A Case Study from Bangladesh (World Bank WPS 4859)

title: Scaling Solar Microgrids in Coastal Communities: The Work of Dr. Jonah Iqbal

figures.title: Levelized cost of electricity (LCOE) with vs without diesel generator
figures.caption: Open-access modeling reports LCOE around A$0.17/kWh with DG and A$0.20/kWh without DG across scenarios.
figures.sourceTitle: Cost-effective and optimal pathways to selecting building microgrid components (Energy and Buildings, 2024)

figures.title: LCOE increase under longer outage requirements
figures.caption: The study reports LCOE increases by ~45% for 8-hour outages and ~85% for 12-hour outages compared to shorter outages.
figures.sourceTitle: Cost-effective and optimal pathways to selecting building microgrid components (Energy and Buildings, 2024)

title: Decarbonizing Urban Transit with Adaptive Storage: A Profile of Dr. Priya Nandakumar

figures.title: Regenerative braking energy recovery efficiency by driving cycle
figures.caption: Reported energy recovery efficiencies across six driving cycles: NEDC 27.69%, WLTC 42.18%, FTP-72 49.54%, FTP-75 47.60%, CLTC-P 49.28%, NYCC 51.06%.
figures.sourceTitle: A Logic Threshold Control Strategy to Improve the Regenerative Braking Energy Recovery of Electric Vehicles (Sustainability 2023)

title: From Lab to Grid: Dr. Mateo Ortiz and the Future of Community Wind

figures.title: Per-capita income impact of wind development
figures.caption: Study estimates a marginal per-capita income impact of $21,604 per MW of wind capacity (controlling for spatial effects).
figures.sourceTitle: Economic Development Impacts of Wind Turbine Development in U.S. Counties (2011)

title: Trustworthy AI at Scale: The Contributions of Dr. Keira Valen

figures.title: Disparate impact ratio before and after reweighing
figures.caption: Fairness mitigation improved DIR for the 60+ age group from 0.65 to 0.82 in predictive marketing models.
figures.sourceTitle: Fairness in Predictive Marketing: Auditing and Mitigating Demographic Bias in Machine Learning for Customer Targeting (MDPI Analytics, 2025)

figures.title: True positive rate parity gap reduction
figures.caption: Mitigation reduced TPR parity gaps by up to ~40% relative to baseline.
figures.sourceTitle: Fairness in Predictive Marketing: Auditing and Mitigating Demographic Bias in Machine Learning for Customer Targeting (MDPI Analytics, 2025)

title: Edge Intelligence for Healthcare: A Profile of Dr. Samuel Adebayo

figures.title: Edge-AI performance vs cloud baseline
figures.caption: Edge-AI achieved 91.9% accuracy with 83% lower latency and 64% higher energy efficiency versus a cloud baseline.
figures.sourceTitle: Edge-AI integrated secure wireless IoT architecture for real time healthcare monitoring (Scientific Reports, 2025)

title: Reducing Bias in Decision Systems: Dr. Hana El-Sayed’s Research Program

figures.title: Equalized odds disparity by mitigation method
figures.caption: Lower equalized-odds values indicate improved fairness. FAIM reduces disparity from 0.299 baseline to 0.234, while reductions achieves 0.036.
figures.sourceTitle: FAIM: Fairness-aware interpretable modeling for trustworthy ML in healthcare (PMC, 2024)

title: Real-Time Learning for Logistics: The Impact of Dr. Owen Park

figures.title: Operational gains from RL logistics optimization
figures.caption: RL + GNN logistics framework reports 7.2% cost reduction vs standard RL, 9.9% improvement vs heuristics, and 83% fewer constraint violations.
figures.sourceTitle: A Hybrid Reinforcement Learning Framework for Optimizing Fuel Delivery Networks under Uncertainty (IIETA)

title: Precision Immunotherapy Platforms: The Work of Dr. Ingrid Suárez

figures.title: Estimated response rates to checkpoint inhibitors
figures.caption: Estimated responder share among all cancer patients increased from 0.14% (2011) to 5.86% (2015) and 12.46% (2018).
figures.sourceTitle: Estimated percentage of US patients with cancer who are eligible for and respond to checkpoint inhibitors (JAMA Network Open)

title: Genomic Diagnostics in Rural Clinics: Dr. Ethan Rahman’s Model

figures.title: Diagnostic yield: genomic sequencing vs targeted panel
figures.caption: Genomic sequencing yielded 49% diagnostic rate versus 27% for a targeted neonatal gene panel.
figures.sourceTitle: Rapid whole-genome sequencing vs targeted neonatal gene panel (JAMA, 2023)

figures.title: Sensitivity: mNGS vs culture for suspected infection
figures.caption: mNGS sensitivity 89.08% versus 56.72% for culture in a 361-patient study.
figures.sourceTitle: Diagnostic performance of metagenomic sequencing vs culture (Front Cell Infect Microbiol, 2024)

title: Rapid Vaccine Manufacturing: The Contributions of Dr. Sofia Tran

figures.title: Vaccine viral titer: packed-bed bioreactor vs multilayer culture
figures.caption: Packed-bed CelCradle lot D achieved 2.04x10^8 TCID50/mL versus 8.15x10^7 TCID50/mL in BioFactory culture (0.01 MOI).
figures.sourceTitle: Production of a chimeric PRRSV-2 vaccine using a lab-scale packed-bed bioreactor CelCradle (BMC Veterinary Research, 2023)

title: Rebuilding Global Health Supply Chains: Dr. Martin Okoye’s Systems Approach

figures.title: Total cost reduction under cooperative supply optimization
figures.caption: Simulation results indicate ~26% lower total supply chain costs for cooperative optimization compared with competitive setups.
figures.sourceTitle: A multi-period and multi-product optimizer for cooperative supply chains (South African Journal of Business Management, 2012)

title: Human Performance at Altitude: The Research of Dr. Camille Foster

figures.title: Altitude training effects (standardized mean difference)
figures.caption: Meta-analysis shows hemoglobin SMD 0.70, hemoglobin mass SMD 0.49, and VO2max SMD -0.13 versus low-altitude training.
figures.sourceTitle: Impact of Altitude Training on Athletes' Aerobic Capacity: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis (Life, 2025)

title: Biomechanics for Injury Prevention: Dr. Lucas Hammond’s Lab

figures.title: ACL injury risk ratio with prevention programs
figures.caption: Meta-analysis reports an overall ACL injury risk ratio of 0.36 for prevention programs versus control (64% risk reduction).
figures.sourceTitle: Reducing ACL injury risk: A meta-analysis of prevention programme effectiveness (Knee Surgery, Sports Traumatology, Arthroscopy, 2024)

title: Cognitive Endurance Under Pressure: Dr. Nora Petrov’s Findings

figures.title: Reaction times across mental fatigue levels
figures.caption: Visual reaction time rises from 231.6 ms (low fatigue) to 278.7 ms (high fatigue); auditory reaction time rises from 198.9 ms to 242.1 ms.
figures.sourceTitle: Reaction time as an indicator of mental fatigue in undergraduate students (Neuroquantology, 2026)

title: Sleep Architecture in Elite Athletes: Dr. Mina Choi’s Program

figures.title: Sleep stages in athletes (minutes per night)
figures.caption: PSG/EEG data show REM 111.3 min, N1 55.8 min, N2 246.7 min, and N3 82.9 min for male athletes.
figures.sourceTitle: Deconstructing athletes’ sleep: systematic review (Sports Medicine - Open, 2021)

title: Autonomous Inspection Systems: The Work of Dr. Arjun Patel

figures.title: Inspection accuracy gains with autonomous pose adjustment
figures.caption: Pose adjustment reduced size estimation error from 23.31% to 10.09% and reduced failure rate from 20% to 6.66%.
figures.sourceTitle: Automated surface damage detection with an embodied intelligence robotic platform (Data-Centric Engineering)

title: Robotic Exoskeletons for Rehabilitation: Dr. Lila Grant’s Contributions

figures.title: Functional gains with robotic exoskeleton gait training
figures.caption: Meta-analysis reports WISCI-II +2.17, LEMS +1.33, and FEV1 +0.60 L versus conventional gait training.
figures.sourceTitle: Comparative efficacy of robotic exoskeleton and conventional gait training in SCI (J NeuroEngineering and Rehabilitation, 2025)

title: Swarm Robotics in Disaster Response: Dr. Diego Morales’ Program

figures.title: Search coverage achieved by UAV swarm
figures.caption: Simulations show 90% coverage within 90 minutes and nearly 99% coverage within 2 hours for a 2 km² area.
figures.sourceTitle: Search and rescue with autonomous flying robots through behavior-based cooperative intelligence (Journal of International Humanitarian Action, 2018)

title: Manufacturing Automation at Scale: Dr. Hyejin Park’s Systems

figures.title: Payload capacity distribution (cumulative share)
figures.caption: Cumulative payload capacity distribution shows 40% of robots under 25 kg and 70% under 210 kg.
figures.sourceTitle: A Statistical Analysis of Commercial Articulated Industrial Robots and Cobots (J. Manuf. Mater. Process., 2024)

figures.title: Weight distribution (cumulative share)
figures.caption: 20% of robots weigh under 50 kg, 40% under 250 kg, and 70% under 1100 kg.
figures.sourceTitle: A Statistical Analysis of Commercial Articulated Industrial Robots and Cobots (J. Manuf. Mater. Process., 2024)
